item.title: Varsity Bytes
item.description: Starting a new playlist on Zerodha Varsity Youtube channel to answer some of the frequently asked queries on Varsity. Here is the 1st video about buying a CE vs. selling a PE when you are bullish (talk about lousy timingðŸ™„ ) PS: Watch at 1.5x ðŸ˜¬
